name: ForgeMasters
description:
Forge Masters is a roguelite deck building game where the action is on a chess board like arena.

The game is in prototype phase with multi stage deployment in mind. Most of the assets are from marketplace so they are subject to change as well as the game name.

1.Prototype

Player default deck
Combat area
Monsters AI ,Deck & Intentions
Only 1 room

2.Demo (this summer)

Dungeon generator
Deck Building
Strategy cards
Boss fight & mobs
Menu & improved UI
Improve target systems
Town
Basic FX

3.Release (this winter)

Refresh Design & Models
Cards upgrades, buffs, and rarity
Inventory & Items
Terrain Buffs
Town Upgrades
More locations, enemies & cards
More characters with unique decks
And much more
